message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's in excellent condition and I think you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget.  I can come down to $75. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $75. I'm willing to go up to $72, but that's as high as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
